Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to control your Voltas products!
After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Voltas Smart” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Voltas Smart” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “Voltas Smart” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the air conditioner.
Alexa, turn off the air conditioner.
Alexa, set the air conditioner speed to low.
Alexa, set the air conditioner speed to mid.
Alexa, set the air conditioner speed to high.
Alexa, set the air conditioner to 25 degrees.
Alexa, set the air conditioner to auto mode.
